casebody.data:
PRICE
v.
STATE of North Carolina, OFFICE OF the STATE AUDITOR. No. 471P14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Brandon L. Truman, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Office of the State Auditor. Michael C. Byrne, Attorney at Law, for Price, John. Gary R. Govert, Assistant Solicitor General, for State of North Carolina Office of the State Auditor. Valerie L. Bateman, Raleigh, OSHR General Counsel, for State of North Carolina Office of the State Auditor. John F. Maddrey, Solicitor General, for State of North Carolina Office of the State Auditor.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of February 2015 by Respondent to Appear:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
ERVIN, J. recused.
